title: AI in Development
subtitle: How I use AI in my daily life
description: AI is no longer just hype; it has become an essential tool in my workflow. I use it daily to speed up development, write better code, and solve complex problems faster.

features.title: GitHub Co-pilot

features.title: Vercel AI SDK

features.title: Prompt Engineering
